events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position within our backend development team.
Your application has been successfully categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your candidacy moving forward.
The initial screening call was completed where your experience in devops and backend engineering was assessed positively.
You responded promptly expressing strong enthusiasm for the technical aspects and challenges of the engineering role.
Your technical interview with our senior developers has been scheduled for next Thursday at 2 PM UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully, demonstrating advanced skills in software architecture and problem-solving.
Your HR interview is scheduled for Monday morning to further discuss your fit with our company culture.
The HR interview was positive, and we appreciate your open communication and enthusiasm for the companyâ€™s values.
We have formally proposed a competitive offer for the software engineer role based on your qualifications and interview performance.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement to join the engineering team.
You formally accepted the offer, confirming your commitment to start working as a software engineer with us.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to development tools, team introductions, and initial training sessions.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully, welcoming you officially as part of our engineering department.
